item.title: The 60/40 has had a painful ride, says Morningstar. What to consider now when diversifying your portfolio
item.description: The 60/40 portfolio was hit so badly in recent years that it experienced more pain than stocks for the only time in the past 150 years, says Morningst...

item.title: Bank of America raises Boeing price target following aerospace giant’s solid earnings print
